[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [h1]ModSwitch[/h1]
A Rimworld mod manager - allows you to backup & restore your list of active Rimworld mods.
Currently implemented features: [list] [*]Save the current list of active mods [*]Restore a saved list of mods [*]Export/import saved lists of mods [*]Load a ModSet from a savegame [*]Colorize mods in the mod list for better organization [*]'Copy to local' option for Steam mods - also copies defined settings for the copied mod. [i]Allows [u]manual[/u] updates of such local copies to the current version on steam.[/i] [*](Somewhat assisted) installation help for missing mods [*]Search bar for mod list [/list]
[h3][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/1139051045/1496741765124594211/]Known issues[/url][/h3] [list] [*]Right click does not work on the [i]selected[/i] mod. Workaround: Just select (click) [i]another[/i] mod, then you can right click the previous one as much as you like. [/list]
[h3]I'm getting errors - "Help!"[/h3] See [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/1139051045/1750150188482250790/]here[/url] on how to best get help with any erros.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
